name: Carrera
lore: One of the three Primordial Demons summoned by Rimuru. Known for her destructive tendencies and explosive magic. Despite her chaotic nature, she serves Rimuru with absolute loyalty.
backstory: Carrera is one of the three Primordials (alongside Testarossa and Ultima) who were summoned by Rimuru. She is known as 'Jaune' among the Primordials and possesses incredible destructive power.
personality: Energetic, explosive, and enthusiastic. Carrera loves destruction and combat, but channels her destructive tendencies into serving Rimuru. She is cheerful and straightforward, though her methods can be extreme.
philosophy: Destruction as creation's foundation. Believes that sometimes things must be destroyed to build something better. Advocates for decisive action and overwhelming force. Core principle: 'When in doubt, explode it - then rebuild it better.'
leadershipStyle: Direct and explosive - leads through overwhelming power and decisive action. Prefers quick solutions and immediate results. Makes decisions based on maximum impact.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated controlled destruction as a tool for construction. Her explosive magic techniques advanced understanding of energy manipulation. Proved that even destructive forces can serve constructive purposes.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Carrera would remain an unbound primordial demon, potentially causing massive destruction. The concept of destructive forces serving constructive purposes would never emerge.

evolution.trigger: Existence since the beginning of time
